title: Spectator Out Loud: Katy Balls, Lionel Shriver, Nick Newman
description:
On this week's episode, we’ll hear from Katy Balls on the political power of Angela Rayner. (00:49)

Then Lionel Shriver on the unscientific divisions between the vaxxed and unvaxxed. (06:52)

And finally, Nick Newman looks at the differences between British and American cartooning. (15:47)

Produced and presented by Sam Holmes
